suggest.ext-ftp: Required to use the Flysystem FTP driver.
suggest.league/flysystem: Required to use the Flysystem local and FTP drivers (^1.1).
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: Required to use the Flysystem S3 driver (^1.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-cached-adapter: Required to use the Flysystem cache (^1.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-sftp: Required to use the Flysystem SFTP driver (^1.0).
suggest.psr/http-message: Required to allow Storage::put to accept a StreamInterface (^1.0).
suggest.symfony/filesystem: Required to enable support for relative symbolic links (^5.1.4).
suggest.symfony/mime: Required to enable support for guessing extensions (^5.1.4).
